page.title: 20COMPUTERS, KINGSTON
page.content: My name is Eamonn Woolley. I am aged ten. I have got a computer called a { {Commodor 64}and a{Spectrum 48K. }The Spectrum has got very good graphics and a lot of software. To plug in a joystick or other things like that you need an interface, on the Commodore it already has a joystick port and two other ports at the back. The Spectrum has very bright colours, on the Commodore they are not so bright. To get the colours you first press{Ctrl} and the colour required, to get some different colours you just press the{Com.}button and the colour.
